metadata.Title: CVE-2020-1951 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
A carefully crafted or corrupt PSD file can cause an infinite loop inApache Tika's PSDParser in versions 1.0-1.23.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-1951` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtika-java - 1.5-4ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tika package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.5-4ubuntu0.1').
